root.name: Solebon
root.description: OverviewSolebon is a solitaire game that is available on various Apple platforms. It includes various different styles of solitaire games, and the ability to customize the look of the cards and color of the background.A free version of the game called Sol Free Solitaire is avaible in the App Store on iPhone. However, it only includes 7 types of solitaire games.Game TypesiPadAccordionAces UpAgnes BernauerAgnes SorelAlhambraAlternateAlternationAmbroseAmerican ToadAskewBaker's DozenBaker's ElevenBaker's GameBaker's Game EasyBaronessBatsfordBatsford TriangleBeleaguered CastleBisleyBlack HoleBlind AlleysBlockadeBlondes and BrunettesBouquetBrigadeBristolBuffalo BillBusy AcesCanisterCarltonCastles in SpainChameleonCitadelColoradoColorsCongressCreepy CrawleyDeauvilleDemonDemon FanDieppeDouble RailDoubletsEasthavenEight OffEight Off EasyEven UpFalling StarFannyFiftyFlyFortressFortune's FavorForty-NineForty ThievesForty Thieves EasyFour SeasonsFourteen OutFrayed CarpetFree CellFree Cell EasyFrogGargantuaGateGatewayGerman PatienceGiantGolfGood MeasureGrandfather's PatienceGrandmother's PatienceHarpHoneybeesJuvenileKing AlbertKlondike Deal 1Klondike Deal 3La Belle LucieLady BettyLady of the ManorLittle BilleeLucasMilligan HarpMiss MilliganMonte CarloNestorPas SeulPenguinProvisionalPyramidPyramid EasyRaglanRainbowRank and FileRussian RevolverScorpionShiftingSimple SimonSimplicitySingle RailSir TommySix by SixSnakeSomersetSpanish PatienceSpiderSpider 1 SuitSpider 2 SuitsSpideretteSquadronStackerStepsStonewallStorehouseStrategyStreetsStreets and AlleysThe ReservesThirty-SixThumb and PouchTriangleTriple AllianceTriple MulliganTripletsVariegated DemonVerticalWaning MoonWestcliffWheatsheafWhiteheadWill o' WispWoodYukonZiggurat
